name: Mr. & Mrs. Sponge. Epic Run
description:
Mr. & Mrs. Sponge. Epic Run, an action game in which you will run and fight against obstacles, and your friends. Dive into the adventures and complete challenging races among overcome obstacles! Compete online with them and get to the finish first!
In this game you play as characters who are ready for the battle among the obstacles and difficult locations! Prepare to run and fall again and again! Improve your skills in this Amazing online runner game!

Why this runner game is Unique:
- Multiplayer and Single mode! Compete with your friends online or play yourself in Single mode!
- Many different characters! Choose your favorite character skin and run ahead to beat various levels!
- Cool and Fun sandbox gameplay! Run through various difficult obstacles and set your own high score! Knock out opponents and set your own time record! Compete with a friend or neighbor in how quickly you can beat this fun runner game!
- A lot of different epic levels! Explore many various worlds and have fun!
- Different obstacles. On your way to the finish line, you will run among incredible obstacles such as hammers, swinging balls, carousels, elevator doors, and more!
- Amazing funny sounds. Sounds are following the game actions and help you to immerse yourself in this fun fall game.
- Support and Updates! Feel free to contact us and report about any problems or suggest improvements to improve the game. This is important for us.

Control run in the race of the characters and don't let them pass out! Immerse yourself in an incredible series of ridiculous challenges among wild obstacle courses in the new runner game.
